title: Add selection confirmation notifications
description: When captains select players for fixtures, automatically send push notifications to selected players informing them of their selection and fixture details.
acceptance_criteria: When captain adds player to fixture, notification sent to player
Notification includes fixture details (date, time, opponent, venue)
Notification includes deep link back to fixture details page
When captain removes player from fixture, notification sent
Notification only sent if player has push notifications enabled
Fallback: email notification if push not available (future enhancement noted)

integration_points: Hook into existing fixture player assignment logic
Call notification service after successful player assignment

testing_requirements: Test notification sent when player added to fixture
Test notification sent when player removed from fixture
Test that no notification sent if player doesn't have subscription

context.user_story: As a player, I want to be notified when I'm selected for a match so I know immediately and can plan accordingly
